name: Dinosaur Assassin
description:
​On your Dinosaur Assassin journey you’ll require a host of weapons and a variety of ways to travel through this dangerous world.

You can build up your weapons to include: Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows), Compound Bow, Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters, Handgun, Rifle.

Travel by Motorbike you can Somersault off the bike to be right in the middle of the action, Sniper rifle long range kills from within the jeep, ride by boat or maybe you prefer to run in and out of the action by foot, your faithful friend - Horse can be called by your whistle to get you out of those tight dino situations.

Dinosaur Assassin: Evolution has High quality graphics and gameplay.

Build Camp fires at night, gather firewood and supplies in the day time. Collect Night Vision Goggles and hunt by night, that is if you’re not too scared by all those carnivores!

Jurassic, Ice Age and Safari worlds are full of wild deadly animals:

TRex, Spinosaurus, Raptors, Triceratops, Velociraptors, Euoplocephalus, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Parasaurolophus. Brontosaurus, Sarcosuchus, Sabertooth Tiger, Mammoth, Dire Wolf, Short faced Bear, Wooly Rhino, Megaloceros, Scarabs, Elephant, Lion, Giraffe, Rhino, Monkey, Meerkat, Lioness, Reedbuck, Flamingo, Lemur, Bee's, Zebra, Crocodile, Wildebeest, Doedicurus, Dunkleosteus, Buffalo, WartHog, Ostrich, Diatryma, Gigantic Worm, Water Snake, Dimetrodon, Compsognathus, Stegosaurus, Allosaurus, Plesiosaur and Teratorn.

Discover and explore so much more… the rest will surprise you.
